about_the_game:
For What Will Come: Reimagined is a narrative-driven psychological mystery that takes you on an emotional journey through time, memory, and family. After years away, Abby Williams returns to her childhood home, only to find that it holds more than just memories—it hides secrets that refuse to stay buried. As strange echoes of the past begin to surface, Abby must uncover the truth behind her family’s fractured history and face the choices that will shape her fate.

This reimagined version of the original game delivers a deeper, more immersive experience with stunning visuals, enhanced storytelling, and impactful story. Will Abby uncover the truth and find closure, or will the past keep her trapped forever?

Key Features:

  • Rich Narrative Experience: Dive into a reimagined narrative that retains the core essence of the original while offering new twists, deeper character development, and more emotional depth.

  • Atmospheric Exploration: Investigate a hauntingly detailed house and surrounding areas, uncovering fragments of Abby’s past.

  • Dynamic Storytelling: Experience a world that evolves and shifts as the mystery unravels in unexpected ways.

  • Enhanced Visuals: Rebuilt from the ground up with breathtaking graphics and atmospheric effects.

  • Immersive Soundtrack: A haunting and emotional score that adapts to the story’s tone and key moments.

  • Dynamic Environments: Discover a world where every element tells a story. From the eerie silence of an abandoned house to the haunting whispers of the past, every environment is crafted to enhance the narrative.

  • Complex Characters: Engage with a cast of well-developed characters, each with their own backstories, motivations, and roles in Abby’s journey.

Step into Abby’s shoes and face the echoes of what was left undone. Will you uncover the truth and break free, or will the past hold you in its grasp forever?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I7-8700K or AMD RYZEN 5 3600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 SUPER 8 GB or AMD Radeon RX 6600 8 GB or Intel Arc A580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD required; GPU Hardware Ray Tracing Required; Graphic Preset: Low / Resolution: 1080p (Native) / Target FPS: 60
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 64-bit
  • Processor: INTEL CORE i7-9700K or AMD Ryzen 7 3700X
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3070ti or AMD Radeon RX 6800
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD required; GPU Hardware Ray Tracing Required; Graphic Preset: High / Resolution: 1080p (Native) / Target FPS: 60
